description: This easy recipe is very versatile. My husband likes to drizzle it over steamed broccoli, while I spoon it over baked potatoes instead of margarine.
name: Ridiculously Easy Vegan Buttermilk Salad Dressing
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup plain, unsweetened soy yogurt (or other non-dairy yogurt)
1/2 cup plain soy milk (or other non-dairy milk)
1-2 tablespoons white wine vinegar (start with 1 tbsp. and add more to taste)
1 teaspoon salt-free seasoning blend such as Mrs. Dash or Mr. Spice House
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder or 1 small clove garlic

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth. Add salt and additional seasonings to taste. Chill until ready to serve. Stir before serving.
